snippet.textDisplay: This is honestly an insult to every South African who puts in their time and effort to empower and develop themselves in order to get close to this level in their occupation. Here sits a person who has the opportunity to make a positive difference through her job but it is very evident that she does not respect the job she has been assigned to hence disrespecting every South African who contributes towards the salary that keeps her in that position.
